Item ID11037

The brine sabre is a one-handed weapon that requires 40 Attack to wield. It is dropped by brine rats in the small cave accessed during Olaf's Quest. The brine sabre is a slightly better alternative to a rune scimitar, boasting 2 higher strength and slash attack bonuses when compared to the former. However, it is significantly more expensive due to the fact it is only dropped by the rarely-killed brine rat at a low rate.

Brine sabres can finish off rockslugs without the use of a bag of salt. It is also one of the few weapons that can be used to kill lobstrosities.

Training[edit | edit source]

The brine sabre is the best-in-slot training weapon for level 40 Attack pures who train on members servers. It was also previously the best-in-slot training weapon for granite maul pures who lacked 55 Slayer (in which the leaf-bladed sword was better as it provided +20 higher offensive and +3 Strength bonuses), however it has since been superseded with the release of the granite hammer, which provides +10 higher offensive and Strength bonuses.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the Brine sabre's special attack, Liquify.

The brine sabre has a special attack, Liquify, which doubles the player's accuracy, and increases the player's Strength, Attack and Defence levels by 25% of the damage dealt.

The special attack only works underwater, and consumes 75% of the player's special attack energy.

Date Changes
28 July 2016
(update | poll)

Killing a rock slug while wielding a brine sabre will now automatically finish it off.

[[File:Brine sabre detail.png|left|110px]]
The '''brine sabre''' is a one-handed [[weapon]] that requires 40 [[Attack]] to wield. It is dropped by [[brine rat]]s in the small cave accessed during [[Olaf's Quest]]. The brine sabre is a slightly better alternative to a [[rune scimitar]], boasting 2 higher [[strength]] and [[slash]] attack bonuses when compared to the former. However, it is significantly more expensive due to the fact it is only dropped by the rarely-killed brine rat at a low rate.

Brine sabres can finish off [[rockslug]]s without the use of a [[bag of salt]]. It is also one of the few weapons that can be used to kill [[Lobstrosity|lobstrosities]].

==Training==
The brine sabre is the best-in-slot training weapon for level 40 Attack [[combat pure|pures]] who train on [[members]] [[server]]s. It was also previously the best-in-slot training weapon for [[granite maul]] pures who lacked 55 [[Slayer]] (in which the [[leaf-bladed sword]] was better as it provided +20 higher offensive and +3 Strength bonuses), however it has since been superseded with the release of the [[granite hammer]], which provides +10 higher offensive and Strength bonuses.
==Special attack==
[[File:Liquefy.gif|thumb|230px|A player performing the Brine sabre's special attack, ''Liquify''.]]
The brine sabre has a special attack, ''Liquify'', which doubles the player's accuracy, and increases the player's [[Strength]], [[Attack]] and [[Defence]] levels by 25% of the damage dealt.

The special attack only works underwater, and consumes 75% of the player's special attack energy.
